class HrdlPublishJobEntity():
    """Class model for the ApiMetaDataEntity table"""
    def __init__(
            self, 
            partition_key,
            row_key,
            is_published, 
            latest_source_data_path,
            latest_handshake_path,
            destination_data_path,
            destination_handshake_path,
            last_folder_name,
            deviation_percentage,
            last_processed_record_count
        ):
        self.partition_key = partition_key
        self.row_key = row_key
        self.is_published  = is_published 
        self.latest_source_data_path = latest_source_data_path
        self.latest_handshake_path = latest_handshake_path
        self.destination_data_path = destination_data_path
        self.destination_handshake_path = destination_handshake_path
        self.last_folder_name = last_folder_name
        self.deviation_percentage = deviation_percentage
        self.last_processed_record_count = last_processed_record_count

    @classmethod
    def from_dict(cls, entity_dict):
        """
        Takes in an api metadata dictionary and returns a constructed api metadata class

            Parameters:
            data (Dict): dictionary containing class values as key value paris

            Returns:
            constructed class
        """           
        return cls(
            partition_key = entity_dict.get('PartitionKey'),
            row_key = entity_dict.get('RowKey'),
            is_published = entity_dict.get('IsPublished'),
            latest_source_data_path = entity_dict.get('LatestSourceDataPath'),
            latest_handshake_path = entity_dict.get('LatestHandshakePath'),
            destination_data_path = entity_dict.get('DestinationDataPath'),
            destination_handshake_path = entity_dict.get('DestinationHandshakePath'),
            last_folder_name = entity_dict.get("LatestFolderName"),
            deviation_percentage = entity_dict.get("DeviationPercentage"),
            last_processed_record_count = entity_dict.get("LastProcessedRecordCount")
        )

    def to_dict(self):
        """
        Converts api metadata class to a dictionary
        Create & Update Table operations only accept a dictionary

            Returns:
            dictionary with class values
        """    
        return {
            "PartitionKey": self.partition_key,
            "RowKey": self.row_key,
            "IsPublished": self.is_published,
            "LatestSourceDataPath": self.latest_source_data_path,
            "LatestHandshakePath": self.latest_handshake_path,
            "DestinationDataPath": self.destination_data_path,
            "DestinationHandshakePath": self.destination_handshake_path,
            "LatestFolderName": self.last_folder_name,
            "DeviationPercentage": self.deviation_percentage,
            "LastProcessedRecordCount": self.last_processed_record_count
